Player History
Drafted in 19th round, 292nd overall pick, by Chicago in 2015...
Injured on 8/5/2015 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 3/2/2016 with a Broken Hand, out for 6-7 weeks...
Injured on 5/21/2017 with a Broken Cheekbone, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 4/26/2018 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2019, off George Davenport (SLB)...
Earned first career win on 4/6/2019...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Won Rookie of the Year in 2019, going 18-9, 2.39 ERA...
Injured on 5/19/2021 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Chicago to New York on 3/2/2022 (Going to NY: P Jason Saterfiel. Going to CHI: 2B Ernest Skipper, P Ronald Hewlett, P Brad Olivier, LF Joel Santillo)...
Traded from New York to Detroit on 7/10/2022 (Going to DET: C Issac Scott, P Jason Saterfiel. Going to NY: SS Robert Guerriero, P Deangelo Montejano, C Leo Vinyals)...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
1/31/2024: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/16/2025 to a 3-year deal worth $1,300,000 per year...
Injured on 5/26/2025 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Was claimed off waivers by Kansas City on 2/15/2027.
Injured on 5/10/2027 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 3/2/2028 to a 1-year deal worth $612,000 per year...
Hit first career homerun on 6/28/2028, off Sidney Ortego (BOS)...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 3/1/2029 to a minor league contract.
